Russia's FSB detains suspected Ukraine agent planning railway attack-TASSRussia's Federal Security Service (FSB) said on Saturday it had detained a 61-year-old Russian man for planning what it called a terrorist attack on Ukraine's behalf on a Trans-Siberian railway junction in the Ural mountains' Sverdlovsk region, state news agency TASS reported. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 07:40:07 GMT TWOA72G5MFKAVBYYXXPH5W6VY4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russias-fsb-detains-suspected-ukraine-agent-planning-railway-attack-tass-2024-03-16/Reuters世界欧洲
'Turn around immediately': Taiwan warns off Chinese coast guard boats again as tensions simmerTaiwan on Saturday warned off Chinese coast guard ships that entered its restricted waters near frontline islands close to China for a second day in a row, as tensions simmer across the sensitive Taiwan Strait. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 07:09:23 GMT ZXL2KUNZM5NS7LO4EOQG3AOS7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/turn-around-immediately-taiwan-warns-off-chinese-coast-guard-boats-again-2024-03-16/Yimou Lee, Fabian Hamacher世界亚太地区
Ukraine drones hit Russia's Syzran oil refinery, governor saysThe governor of Russia's Samara region said on Saturday that Ukrainian drones had struck two oil refineries belonging to state-owned oil giant Rosneft in the region, causing no casualties but leaving one facility on fire. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 06:00:59 GMT 2AVWFROZUBOWHDOUPCNDXCLXRU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-drones-hit-Russias-syzran-oil-refinery-regional-governor-says-2024-03-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Fiji upholds China policing agreement, Guardian Australia reportsFiji will maintain a policing cooperation deal with China after a review of the agreement which has sparked concern in Australia, the Guardian Australia news site reported. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 05:27:17 GMT ADWOPOQFRVKE3E4LM5DJA6UDZA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/fiji-upholds-china-policing-agreement-guardian-australia-reports-2024-03-16/Reuters世界亚太地区
Indian navy intercepts Somali pirates on cargo ship RuenAn Indian navy warship has intercepted the hijacked the cargo ship Ruen and demanded the Somali pirates on board surrender, a navy spokesperson said on Saturday. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 04:15:55 GMT LGXQMTTWSJNFHC7RQDIKDA5OBY https://www.reuters.com/world/indian-navy-thwarts-somali-pirates-using-cargo-ship-ruen-ani-reports-2024-03-16/Reuters世界
Jail terms of up to 7 years for 12 who stormed Hong Kong legislature in 2019A Hong Kong court on Saturday sentenced 12 people to jail terms from more than four years to nearly seven years in a high-profile rioting case linked to the storming of the city legislature during a pro-democracy protest in 2019. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 03:39:53 GMT 3NBGLH3K35JZNDTUBY3LSAXOPQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/twelve-sentenced-jail-storming-hong-kong-legislature-2019-2024-03-16/Jessie Pang, Edward Cho世界亚太地区
Taiwanese citizen found dead after boat capsize off IndonesiaA Taiwanese citizen missing for days following a passenger boat capsize off the Indonesia's capital Jakarta was found dead on Friday, the coast guard said in a statement. Tensions rise in Haiti as leadership remains in balanceResidents braced for another tense night in Haiti's capital Port-au-Prince on Friday, as attacks continued across parts of the city in the aftermath of the resignation of Prime Minister Henry and in the absence of a clear plan to replace him. Australia PM to talk wine tariffs with China Foreign MinisterAustralia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Saturday the removal of Chinese tariffs on Australian wine would be on the agenda when he meets China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi next week in Canberra. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 00:51:58 GMT OCTCKJ3LYRMN3BMBEPSGRK2P6I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-pm-talk-wine-tariffs-with-china-foreign-minister-canberra-2024-03-16/Reuters世界亚太地区
North Korea's Kim rides car given by Putin, oversees drillsNorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un publicly rode in a car given to him by Russian President Vladimir Putin in "clear proof" of the strengthening friendship between the two countries, state media reported on Saturday. Ukrainian authorities launch mass evacuation in northern regionUkrainian authorities have begun mass evacuations of communities in the country's northern Sumy region close to the Russian border after extended periods of intense shelling of the area, local officials said on Friday.
